verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> of degrees הַבֹּטְחִ֥ים <WH982> They that trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD כְּֽהַר־ <WH2022> [shall be] as mount צִיּ֥וֹן <WH6726> Zion לֹא־ <WH3808> cannot יִ֝מּ֗וֹט <WH4131> [which] cannot be removed לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever יֵשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> [but] abideth

יְֽרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> Jerusalem הָרִים֮ <WH2022> As the mountains סָבִ֪יב <WH5439> [are] round about לָ֥הּ וַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> so the LORD סָבִ֣יב <WH5439> [is] round about לְעַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> his people מֵ֝עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> this וְעַד־ <WH5704> from henceforth even for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹ֪א <WH3808> shall not יָנ֡וּחַ <WH5117> shall not rest שֵׁ֤בֶט <WH7626> For the rod הָרֶ֗שַׁע <WH7562> of the wicked עַל֮ <WH5921> upon גּוֹרַ֪ל <WH1486> upon the lot הַֽצַּדִּ֫יקִ֥ים <WH6662> of the righteous לְמַ֡עַן <WH4616> lest לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יִשְׁלְח֖וּ <WH7971> put forth הַצַּדִּיקִ֨ים <WH6662> the righteous בְּעַוְלָ֬תָה <WH5766> unto iniquity יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3027> their hands
הֵיטִ֣יבָה <WH2895> Do good יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD לַטּוֹבִ֑ים <WH2896> unto [those that be] good וְ֝לִֽישָׁרִ֗ים <WH3477> and [to them that are] upright בְּלִבּוֹתָֽם׃ <WH3826> in their hearts

וְהַמַּטִּ֤ים <WH5186> As for such as turn aside עַֽקַלְקַלּוֹתָ֗ם <WH6128> unto their crooked ways יוֹלִיכֵ֣ם <WH1980> will lead יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> with פֹּעֲלֵ֣י <WH6466> with the workers הָאָ֑וֶן <WH205> of iniquity שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <WH7965> [but] peace עַל־ <WH5921> be upon יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> [shall be] upon Israel
